WWRE
Excitebike World Rally

Infinite Turbo (B + 1) [Sharkbyte]
284B732A 00000600
48000000 80C61200
DE000000 80008180
120002D0 00003EA5
E0000000 80008000

E0000000 80008000

Press and hold 2 for Jupiter gravity [Sharkbyte]
284B732A FEFF0100
48000000 80574A14
DE000000 80008180
14000050 40400000
E0000000 80008000

Press and hold 2 for Moon Jump/float [Sharkbyte]
284B732A FEFF0100
48000000 80574A14
DE000000 80008180
14000050 42000000
E0000000 80008000

48000000 80574A08
DE000000 80008180
14000050 42000000
E0000000 80008000

DE000000 80008180
14000050 42000000
E0000000 80008000

DE000000 80008180

E0000000 80008000

Condition Modifier [Sharkbyte]
48000000 80574A14
DE000000 80008180
14000278 0000000X
E0000000 80008000

Condition Modifier CPU 1 [Sharkbyte]
48000000 80574A08
DE000000 80008180
14000278 0000000X
E0000000 80008000

Condition Modifier CPU 2 [Sharkbyte]
48000000 80574A0C
DE000000 80008180
14000278 0000000X
E0000000 80008000

Condition Modifier CPU 3 [Sharkbyte]
48000000 80574A10
DE000000 80008180
14000278 0000000X
E0000000 80008000
Condition Modifier values
0= never crashing
1= always crashing
2= always on side
3= always overheating

Lane Switcher (in air) [Sharkbyte]
284B732A 00000001
48000000 80574A14
DE000000 80008180
140000DC 00000003
E0000000 80008000
284B732A 00000002
48000000 80574A14
DE000000 80008180
140000DC 00000000
E0000000 80008000
284B732A 00000008
48000000 80574A14
DE000000 80008180
140000DC 00000001
E0000000 80008000
284B732A 00000004
48000000 80574A14
DE000000 80008180
140000DC 00000002
E0000000 80008000
up= outer top lane
back= inner top lane
forward= inner bottom lane
down= outer bottom lane

Improved ASM Moon Jump [Sharkbyte]
284B732A FBFF0400
04395064 D05A0058
CC000000 00000001
C2395064 00000005
2C130003 4182000C
D05A0058 4800000C
3D804170 919A0058
C05A0058 D05A0058
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
press B

Improved ASM Moon Jump cpu 1 [Sharkbyte]
284B732A FBFF0400
04395064 D05A0058
CC000000 00000001
C2395064 00000007
3D608110 396B2C00
7C0BD000 41820004
2C130000 4182000C
D05A0058 4800000C
3D804170 919A0058
C05A0058 D05A0058
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
cannot have this code with any other Asm moon jump codes

Improved moon jump codes; use these

Improved moon jump [Sharkbyte]
284B732A FBFF0400
48000000 80574A14
DE000000 80008180
14000058 41C00000
E0000000 80008000
don't bother using asm moon jump anymore
use this one
don't use with regular moon jump

Profile 1

Friend points [Sharkbyte]
CE000000 80008180
02CD534A 0000xxxx
E0000000 80008000

Anyone points [Sharkbyte]
CE000000 80008180
02CD534E 0000xxxx
E0000000 80008000
*only need to activate points codes once
*game saves points once code is activated
*bikes unlocked are saved and can't be undone

Profile 4

Friend points [Sharkbyte]
CE000000 80008180
02CD5386 0000xxxx
E0000000 80008000

Anyone points [Sharkbyte]
CE000000 80008180
02CD538A 0000xxxx
E0000000 80008000
values
50 points= 0032
100 points= 0064
250 points= 00FA
500 points= 01F4
9999 points= 270F
